text: "Obsession" is a song. It is the second single by the French Canadian synthpop group Nudimension. The song is in French (except for one refrain in English from Anne-Marie Cyr). It was recorded at Fountain Studios in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It was released by Saison Records (Canada) in May 1984. Like most of Nudimension's singles, Anne-Marie Cyr sang in it. The single achieved moderate success in French-speaking regions of Canada, charting in the top 20 francophone Québécoise charts, and in Europe.*Psyquebelique 2009 After the single charted, an English-language version (named "Rendez-Vous") was recorded. It was not released as a single, but it is on the band's greatest hits album The Best of Nudimension.Album Notes ==Credits== *Anne-Marie Cyr - vocals *Louie Louie - vocals, drums, keyboards *Marc Fontaine - keyboards ==References== ==Other websites== *Nudimension Article and recent interview (in French) Category:1984 songs
title: Obsession (Nudimension song)
